title: Invicta Men's 1512 I"Force" Stainless Steel Watch with Cloth and Leather Strap, Black
feature: Round stainless steel watch featuring date window at four o’clock position with 60-second, 60-minute, and 1/10-second subdials
Japanese quartz movement with analog display
Features crown and pushers positioned at nine o’clock position and buckle closure on cloth and leather strap
Water-resistant to 100 m (330 ft): suitable for snorkeling, as well as swimming, but not diving
description: Stainless steel case with a black canvas / leather-backed strap Fixed silver-tone bezel. Black dial with white hands and Arabic numeral hour markers. Minute markers. Tachymeter around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and hour markers. Date display at 4 o'clock position. Chronograph - three sub-dials displaying: 60 minute, 60 second, 1/10 of a seconds. Quartz movement. Scratch resistant flame fusion crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Case diameter: 46 mm. Case thickness: 12 mm. Band width: 22 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: chronograph, date, tachymeter, hour, minute, second. Invicta Lefty Force Chronograph Black Dial Stainless Steel Mens Watch 1512. An undeniable force to be reckoned with, the Invicta Men's 1512 I Force Collection Chronograph Strap Watch is the perfect marriage of style and superior functionality. This rugged timepiece begins with a round 45mm stainless steel case with a fixed bezel and a prominent textured crown on the left side of the case with two pushers. These elements surround a dashing black dial, which is protected by a hardened mineral crystal and features white Arabic numeral hour markers with a stenciled look and luminous hands powered by reliable Japanese quartz movement. The dial also features three chronograph sub-dials offering 60-second, 60-minute and 1/10th-of-a-second sub-dials, a tachymeter scale on the inner bezel and a date display window at the 4 'o clock position. A black cloth strap with leather backing keeps this watch on the wrist, while a buckle clasp ensures its secure placement. Finally, this watch boasts water resistance up to 330 feet (100 meters). A stellar addition to any watch collection, don't let this Invicta slip through your hands.
